name: The Cure-All
description: With the same flavor base as thePenicillin—lemon, ginger, and Scotch—this foundation of this drink is already a delicious antidote to a long, cold day. Adding a shot of beet juice just ups the curative ante.
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces blended Scotch (such as Black Bottle)
1 1/2 ounces lemon juice, from two lemons
2 ounces Domaine de Canton ginger liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add beet juice, Scotch, lemon juice, and ginger liqueur. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds.
Strain evenly into two coupe glasses and serve.
